<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>x_cdltd_loaner_req_loaner_request_script_2</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[if (current.item_type == 'cmdb_ci_computer') {
        var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2(); //create instance of RESTMessageV2 class
        request.setEndpoint('https://nowlearning-nlinst01680157-0001.lab.service-now.com/api/now/table/u_password_vault?sysparm_query=u_asset%3D' + current.cmdb_ci.asset_tag + '&sysparm_fields=u_password&sysparm_limit=1'); // create endpoint
        request.setHttpMethod('GET'); // set HTTP method to GET
        //Eg. UserName="admin", Password="admin" for this code sample.
        //Set credentials for web service authentication
        var user = 'admin';
        var password = 'India@123';
        request.setBasicAuth(user, password); //set Authorization type
        request.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json"); //set Request header 
        var response = request.execute(); //send the request to the we b service
         var obj = new JSON.parse(response.getBody()); //parse and store the response body in a variable
        var myPass = obj.result[0].u_password;
        template.print('Password:'+ myPass);
    }]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-06 07:13:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>e418f934834202107f446feeddda1e0e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_cdltd_loaner_req_loaner_request_script_2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_cdltd_loaner_req">5a5201e3833102107f446feeddda1ec5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">5a5201e3833102107f446feeddda1ec5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_e418f934834202107f446feeddda1e0e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-06 07:13:17</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>
